dcterms:creator: Ben H. Jansen
Vincent G. Rit
dcterms:description: Synthetic data obtained by solving a system describing a model of pyramidal cell population behaviour, from which a signal visible by microelectrodes can be obtained. The synthetic data allow tracing the reconstruction algorithm when the whole system is known.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Data

dcterms:creator: Xing Chen
Aitor Morales-Gregorio
Julia Sprenger
Alexander Kleinjohann
Shashwat Sridhar
Sacha J. van Albada
Sonja Grün
Pieter R. Roelfsema
dcterms:description: Electrophysiological recordings obtained from implanted electrodes in the primate visual cortex during resting state. The data describe the signal of the microelectrodes in the primate resting state, where α-waves are generated.
dcterms:title: Electrophysiological Recordings
